Name: sp-secret-hideout
Description: The Secret Hideout cannot be built. At the end of the game, score 3 extra points if the card is in your hand.

Name: sp-ghost-neighbourhood
Description: At the end of the game, the Ghost Neighbourhood counts as any district type of your choice.

Name: sp-stable
Description: You can build another district this turn.

Name: sp-fort
Description: The Fort cannot be destroyed by the Warlord.

Name: sp-goldmine
Description: If during resource acquisition you choose to receive gold, get 1 extra gold.

Name: sp-dragon-gates
Description: At the end of the game, score 2 extra points.

Name: sp-imperial-treasury
Description: At the end of the game, score 1 extra point for each gold in your stash.

Name: sp-capitol
Description: If at the end of the game you have built at least 3 districts of the same type, score 3 extra points.

Name: sp-map-room
Description: At the end of the game, score 1 extra point for each card in your hand.

Name: sp-wishing-well
Description: At the end of the game, score 1 extra point for each special district in your city.

Name: sp-forge
Description: Once during your turn, you may pay two gold to draw three district cards.

Name: sp-laboratory
Description: Once during your turn, you may discard a district card from your hand and receive two gold from the bank.

Name: sp-museum
Description: Once during your turn, you may put 1 card under the museum card. At the end of the game, score 1 extra point for each card under the Museum.

Name: sp-armory
Description: Destroy the Armory to destroy 1 enemy's district of your choice.

Name: sp-scaffolding
Description: You can build the district by destroying scaffolding instead of paying the cost of the selected district.

Name: sp-monument
Description: If you have the crown at the end of the game, score 5 extra points.

Name: sp-school-of-magic
Description: For abilities that gain resources for your districts, the School of Magic counts as the district type of your choice.
